text: Courcelles is a municipality in Le Granit Regional County Municipality in the Estrie region in Quebec, Canada. It is approximately south of Quebec City. Artist Carmen Coulombe was born in Courcelles. == Demographics == In the 2011 Census, Statistics Canada originally reported that Courcelles had a population of 1,004 living in 438 of its 486 total dwellings, an 8.2% change from its 2006 population of 928. Statistics Canada subsequently amended the 2011 census results to a population of 950 living in 418 of its 466 total dwellings, a 2.4% change from 2006. With a land area of , it had a population density of in 2011. == References == ==External links== * Category:Municipalities in Quebec Category:Incorporated places in Estrie Category:Le Granit Regional County Municipality
title: Courcelles, Quebec
